status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
HIVE-16213 made QueryWrapper AutoCloseable, but queries are still closed manually and not by using try-with-resource. And now Query itself is auto closeable, so we don't need the wrapper at all.

So we should get rid of QueryWrapper and use try-with-resource to create queries.

comments.body: Unfortunately we can't just use AutoCloseable of the Query itself because it can throw exception and it will cause many changes in APIs which currently don't throw exceptions. Instead I am changing the code to rely on the auto-closeable semantics of QueryWrapper itself.
There are also many cases where {{QueryWrapper}} isn't used and instead {{rollbackAndCleanup()}} is called directly to close the query. This should be converted to {{QueryWrapper}} as well.

There are several cases in the code:

1) Users of existing QueryWrapper
2) Code that uses Query, but cals rollbackAndCleanup to close it
3) Code that calls (or doesn't) query.closeAll()

This patch converts *all* uses of Query in ObjectStore to auto-closeable use that guarantees that it is closed always closed.
Note that after collection query close we can't call size() on it, so in such cases query is copied to another collection.

As part of the patch I also cleaned up various small things that don't warrant individual JIRAs.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12891556/HIVE-17730.02.patch
